name: Cosmic Drift
description:
Drifting off from an unknown wreck, a lone escape pod drifts along the void.

Use the directional keys to drift left, right, forwards, and backwards and avoid the asteroids. Don't let your hull integrity drop too low or it's game over.

Credits:
Soundtrack: "Lines of Code" by Trevor Lentz (https://opengameart.org/content/lines-of-code)
Explosion Sound Effect by WrathGames (http://wrathgames.com/blog)
Procrastinating Pixie Font by Sajid Ahmed ES / Sajiiides (https://www.fontspace.com/pro-pixie-font-f44959)
Xolonium Font by Severin Meyer (https://fontlibrary.org/en/font/xolonium)
